mapper.select: select * from T_REPORT where dicom_img_mark_char = #{dicom_img_mark_char} and source_type=#{source_type} and type = #{type}
select * from T_REPORT_SHARE where REPORT_ID = #{report_id}
select count(id) from T_REPORT_MSG where REPORT_ID = #{report_id} and recv_user_id = #{recv_user_id} and status = #{status}
select count(id) from T_REPORT_SHARE_SPEECH where SHARE_ID=#{share_id}
mapper.update: update T_REPORT_MSG set status=#{status} where REPORT_ID=#{report_id} and RECV_USER_ID=#{recv_user_id}
mapper.select: select * from T_MOFIDY_REPORT_REQUEST WITH(UPDLOCK) where id=#{id}
mapper.update: update T_MOFIDY_REPORT_REQUEST set status=#{status} where report_id=#{report_id}
mapper.select:
select count(1) from T_REPORT t0 left join T_CASE_HISTORY t1 on t0.case_his_id=t1.id LEFT JOIN T_DIAGNOSIS_V2 t11 on t0.diagnosis_id = t11.id left join T_ORGANIZATION t2 on t11.REQUEST_ORG_ID=t2.id left join T_ORGANIZATION t3 on t11.DIAGNOSIS_ORG_ID=t3.id left join T_ORGANIZATION t4 on t0.PUBLISH_REPORT_ORG_ID=t4.id left join T_DIC_VALUE t5 on t0.DICOM_IMG_DEVICE_TYPE_ID=t5.id left join T_BASE_USER t7 on t11.REQUEST_USER_ID=t7.id left join T_BASE_USER t8 on t11.ACCEPT_USER_ID=t8.id left join T_BASE_USER t9 on t11.VERIFY_USER_ID=t9.id where 1=1
and t2.ORG_NAME like '%'+#{request_org_name}+'%'
and t7.USER_NAME like '%'+#{request_user_name}+'%'
and t8.USER_NAME like '%'+#{accept_user_name}+'%'
and t9.USER_NAME like '%'+#{verify_user_name}+'%'
and t3.ORG_NAME like '%'+#{diagnosis_org_name}+'%'
and t4.ORG_NAME like '%'+#{publish_org_name}+'%'
and t0.case_his_num like '%'+#{medicalHisNum}+'%'
and t0.DICOM_IMG_DEVICE_TYPE_ID=#{device_type_id}
and t0.CREATE_TIME between #{start} and #{end}
and t0.F_O_M=#{fom}
select * from T_MOFIDY_REPORT_REQUEST where report_id=#{report_id}
select count(id) from T_REPORT_MSG where send_org_id=#{send_org_id} and report_id=#{report_id}
mapper.insert: insert into T_REPORT_MSG ( REPORT_ID, send_org_id, send_user_id, recv_org_id, recv_user_id, content, send_time, recv_time, status, type )values( #{report_id}, #{send_org_id}, #{send_user_id}, #{recv_org_id}, #{recv_user_id}, #{content}, #{send_time}, #{recv_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status}, #{type} )
mapper.update: update T_REPORT set NOTE = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRINT_USER_ID = #{print_user_id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, PRINT_TIMES = #{print_times,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PRINT_TIME = #{print_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, view_user_id = #{view_user_id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, duty_org_id = #{duty_org_id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, duty_report_user_id = #{duty_report_user_id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, duty_verify_user_id = #{duty_verify_user_id,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id}

update T_REPORT set NOTE = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRINT_USER_ID = #{print_user_id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, PRINT_TIMES = #{print_times,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PRINT_TIME = #{print_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, view_user_id = #{view_user_id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, F_O_M = #{f_o_m}, PIC_OPINION = #{pic_opinion}, PIC_CONCLUSION = #{pic_conclusion} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from T_REPORT WITH(UPDLOCK) where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into T_REPORT ( CASE_HIS_ID, CREATE_TIME, DICOM_IMG_DEVICE_TYPE_ID, PIC_OPINION, PIC_CONCLUSION, PUBLISH_REPORT_ORG_ID, dicom_img_id, F_O_M, PRINT_USER_ID, PRINT_TIMES, PRINT_TIME, view_user_id, case_his_num, case_symptom, case_enter_time, case_leave_time, case_hospitalized_num, case_reception_section, case_reception_doctor, case_eaf_list, case_source_type, case_type, patient_name, patient_identity_id, patient_gender, patient_birthday, patient_home_address, patient_born_address, patient_work, patient_sick_his, patient_source_type, dicom_img_mark_char, dicom_img_checklist_num, dicom_img_check_time, dicom_img_check_pro, diagnosis_id, source_type, publish_user_id, type, note, request_class, request_urgent_level, duty_org_id, duty_report_user_id, duty_verify_user_id )values( #{case_his_id}, #{create_time}, #{dicom_img_device_type_id}, #{pic_opinion}, #{pic_conclusion}, #{publish_report_org_id}, #{dicom_img_id}, #{f_o_m}, #{print_user_id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{print_times}, #{print_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{view_user_id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{case_his_num}, #{case_symptom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{case_enter_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{case_leave_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{case_hospitalized_num,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{case_reception_section,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{case_reception_doctor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{case_eaf_list,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{case_source_type}, #{case_type}, #{patient_name}, #{patient_identity_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patient_gender}, #{patient_birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{patient_home_address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patient_born_address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patient_work,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patient_sick_his,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patient_source_type}, #{dicom_img_mark_char}, #{dicom_img_checklist_num,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dicom_img_check_time}, #{dicom_img_check_pro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{diagnosis_id}, #{source_type}, #{publish_user_id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{type}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{request_class,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{request_urgent_level}, #{duty_org_id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{duty_report_user_id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{duty_verify_user_id,jdbcType=BIGINT} );
